public_faq.41.question_ru: How to sign up for the procedure?
public_faq.41.answer_ru: You can sign up online through the form on our website, by calling or writing to us on social networks.
public_faq.42.question_ru: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
public_faq.42.answer_ru: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment by giving us at least 24 hours notice.
public_faq.43.answer_ru: We use only premium professional materials from the world's leading brands: OPI, CND, L'Oreal Professional, Kerastase, MAC and others.
public_faq.44.question_ru: Do you have a loyalty program?
public_faq.44.answer_ru: Yes, we have a cumulative discount system for regular customers.
public_faq.45.question_ru: How long does the procedure take?
public_faq.45.answer_ru: The duration depends on the chosen procedure.
public_faq.46.question_ru: Is it possible to do several procedures in one visit?
public_faq.47.question_ru: Are there any contraindications to the procedures?
public_faq.47.answer_ru: Some procedures have contraindications (pregnancy, allergic reactions, skin diseases).
public_faq.48.question_ru: What payment methods do you accept?
public_faq.48.answer_ru: We accept cash, bank cards (Visa, Mastercard), as well as payment through mobile applications.
public_reviews.32.text_ru: I had my hair dyed and the results were simply gorgeous!
public_reviews.34.text_ru: I've been going to this salon for a year now.
public_reviews.36.text_ru: I had a pedicure and manicure - everything was top notch!
